channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In first call, Russian defense chief cautioned top US general about large-scale military exercise in Mediterranean Sea
Hegseth signed NDA, received six-figure severance after leaving veterans' group
item.description: Pete Hegseth received a six-figure sum amid allegations of financial mismanagement, intoxication and sexual impropriety, all of which he denies.

item.title: Memphis police use excessive force and discriminate against Black people, Justice Department finds

item.title: Massive lottery jackpot is set to expire. Mystery player was part of an incredibly rare draw

item.title: Supreme Court justice sparks social media fire storm for her comments on gender transitions for minors
Bitcoin races past $100,000, fueled by post-election rally
item.description: The price of bitcoin has surged more than 40% since Election Day.

item.title: Police hunt for the gunman who killed UnitedHealthcare’s boss in Manhattan

item.title: Bitcoin price reaches $100,000-mark for first time ever
item.description: This comes just two years after Bitcoin's price dropped below $17,000 following the collapse of crypto exchange FTX.

item.title: Japan brewers hope UNESCO listing will make sake as popular as sushi
Writing on shell cases discovered at scene where United Healthcare CEO was shot dead
item.description: UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson was shot near a Midtown Manhattan hotel in a potentially targeted shooting early Wednesday, according to police.

item.title: 2 students, 5 and 6, in critical condition after shooting at California school
item.description: A gunman opened fire at a Christian grammar school in California on Wednesday, authorities said.
